name: Living Blade of Disaster
damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
condition_immunities: blinded, deafened, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained, unconscious
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.Magic Resistance: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Unfettered: The living spell can move through any barrier, even a wall of magical force.
traits.Unusual Nature: The living spell doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
